levelledPara.title: Purpose
levelledPara.para: Define reusable, safety-critical airframe practices for AMPEL360 PLUS across design, manufacturing, and maintenance.

levelledPara.title: Governance
levelledPara.para: All practices are governed by BREX rules, UTCS traceability, and MAL-EEM ethics. Conflicts defer to system-specific DMs.

levelledPara.title: Scope
levelledPara.para: Fasteners & torque; sealants & adhesives; corrosion prevention; electrical bonding & grounding.
